name: Australis background tabs visible+hover
description: Make the background tabs visible even when not hovered and add a background highlight when hovered.
additional_info: Jun 03 2014 (Optional highlight) For darker theme backgrounds that also use the default dark tab text, I added a block of code to give the background tabs a "half-light" highlight when they're not hovered. Just edit the code to uncomment and enable it (follow how-to directions in the code).
